text: Hi <@U037RKU48H0>! Create a DB workflow, set a company property (single check) to true, this will be trigger on Company Based which will then update deal name.
You can add another filed called `Deal Name updated by Company` and then if this property is unknown, then update deal name. If not, that means it's already updated OR maybe updated by somebody else.
Thanks!  I have a workaround already, but was interested to know if the referenced article was a feature that used to exist and no longer does.  thanks
